page.title: 09Recreation-games
page.content:
Here is a further selection of our skipping rhymes.
4. Up and down the house Trying to catch a mouse If you catch it by the tail Hang it on a rusty nail Give it to the cook The cook makes the soup How do you like the soup? Deeelicious...deeelicious Deeelicious...deeelicious
5. On a mountain stands a lady Who she is I do not know. All she wants is gold and silver All she wants is a nice young man. So please call in (girl) dear, (girl) dear,(girl) dear Please call in (girl) dear, While I go out to play.
